Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes a usage monitor program
Summary: Establishes a usage monitor program for the purposes of notifying customers when energy usage exceeds a cost or usage threshold in a given billing period determined by the customer.
LawCode: Amd ยง44, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to establishing a usage monitor program
